languages.text: "Шаттл в полной готовности для отбытия. Очевидных опасностей не зафиксировано, однако... что-то на этой планете неладно. Будьте осторожны".
"The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Шаттл в полной готовности для отбытия. Очевидных опасностей не зафиксировано, однако... что-то на этой планете неладно. Будьте осторожны".

traits.locale_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please take caution, Lord Captain."
"The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please take caution, Lord Captain."

"The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «La lanzadera está preparada. No detectamos peligros evidentes, pero... hay algo en este planeta que no encaja. Tenga cuidado, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «La lanzadera está preparada. No detectamos peligros evidentes, pero... hay algo en este planeta que no encaja. Tenga cuidado, Lord Capitán».
«La lanzadera está preparada. No detectamos peligros evidentes, pero... hay algo en este planeta que no encaja. Tenga cuidado, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: “穿梭机已准备就绪。我们没有发现明确的危险，不过……这颗行星显然不太对劲。请务必当心，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “穿梭机已准备就绪。我们没有发现明确的危险，不过……这颗行星显然不太对劲。请务必当心，舰长大人。”
“穿梭机已准备就绪。我们没有发现明确的危险，不过……这颗行星显然不太对劲。请务必当心，舰长大人。”

languages.text: « La navette est prête. Nous ne détectons aucun danger apparent, mais... cette planète a quelque chose de suspect. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente}, {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « La navette est prête. Nous ne détectons aucun danger apparent, mais... cette planète a quelque chose de suspect. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente}, {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: 「シャトルの準備ができました。目立った危険は検知していませんが…この惑星には明らかに何か異変があります。ロード・キャプテン、どうかご注意ください」
languages.original_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「シャトルの準備ができました。目立った危険は検知していませんが…この惑星には明らかに何か異変があります。ロード・キャプテン、どうかご注意ください」
「シャトルの準備ができました。目立った危険は検知していませんが…この惑星には明らかに何か異変があります。ロード・キャプテン、どうかご注意ください」

languages.text: "Mekik hazır. Görünürde herhangi bir tehlike tespit etmedik ancak... Bu gezegende bir terslik olduğu aşikâr. Dikkatli olun Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Mekik hazır. Görünürde herhangi bir tehlike tespit etmedik ancak... Bu gezegende bir terslik olduğu aşikâr. Dikkatli olun Lord Kaptan."
"Mekik hazır. Görünürde herhangi bir tehlike tespit etmedik ancak... Bu gezegende bir terslik olduğu aşikâr. Dikkatli olun Lord Kaptan."

languages.text: "Das Shuttle steht bereit. Wir erkennen keine offensichtlichen Gefahren, aber ... irgendetwas stimmt auf diesem Planeten nicht. Bitte seid vorsichtig, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "The shuttle is prepared. We are detecting no apparent dangers, but... something is clearly amiss on this planet. Please use caution, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Das Shuttle steht bereit. Wir erkennen keine offensichtlichen Gefahren, aber ... irgendetwas stimmt auf diesem Planeten nicht. Bitte seid vorsichtig, Lord Captain."
